original_alert_details.kibana.alert.rule.name: File Creation Time Changed
original_alert_details.kibana.alert.reason: file event with process AnyDesk.exe, file user.conf.new, on Neeraj-Sharma.velox.co.in created medium alert File Creation Time Changed.
original_alert_details.kibana.alert.rule.description: Identifies modification of a file creation time. Adversaries may modify file time attributes to blend malicious content with existing files. Timestomping is a technique that modifies the timestamps of a file often to mimic files that are in trusted directories.
